notes: Successfully defined code distance with all fundamental properties. All 11 lemmas proven: minimum distance definition, bounds, characterizations, and applications to error detection/correction. Key results: distance ≤ n+1, error detection for d-1 errors, error correction for ⌊(d-1)/2⌋ errors. Clean difficulty 2 unit.
next_steps: Foundation for Gilbert-Varshamov bound and code existence theorems
